title: Wasantha: 18 years
creator_credit: Chris Foss, Norsk Rikskringkasting and UNICEF
brief_description: Wasantha is an 18 year old Sri Lankan school girl who, in addition to her family responsibilities, is a voluntary health worker in a government run clinic.
description: Wasantha is an 18 year old Sri Lankan school girl who, in addition to her family responsibilities, is a voluntary health worker in a government run clinic.
